All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthController
This Controller handles login and Register routes, using Spring Security to check email/password
AuthEntryPointJwt
This class is used as a error handler.
AuthTokenFilter
This class uses JwtUtils utility functions to validate the JWT token.
Comment
 
CommentDto
 
CommentMapper
For each comment, we only need to show comment content and its author
CommentRequest
 
CreatePostRequest
 
JwtResponse
 
JwtUtils
This class provides several utility functions to manage JWT token: - generate the token - extract username to validate it later with - validate the token (uses secret key)

MddApiApplication
 
MessageResponse
 
Post
 
PostController
This is used to create posts, and also comment on them.

This mapper gets a commentDto list and set it in PostDto to simplify JSON data

This is used only to get all topics.

User
 
UserController
This Controller handles User (for profile page) but also subscriptions, because they are Mapped in User entity
UserDetailsImpl
This is a user class that is compatible with Spring Security system
UserDetailsServiceImpl

UserRepository
 
UserService
 
WebSecurityConfig
This class filters out unauthenticated HTTP requests except login and register pages
